oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Managing clients in solo practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Blackwell, Sarah M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: perception
consequences
enforcement
stream-line
accountability
client expectations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ark Veterinary Services, LLC is an ambulatory mixed ani­mal practice in rural South Carolina. The practice, entering its eighth year, is owned solely by Dr. Sarah Blackwell. This manuscript offers guidance based on successes and pitfalls experienced while managing clients as a solo practitioner. Cli­ent expectations, client communication techniques, programs/ companies/services, and support staff are areas when managed properly, prepare solo practitioners for a successful career.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 59 (2025): 2025 Recent Graduate Conference Proceedings; 114-115
